text_block_list.text: (Thump... Thump...)
On Christmas morning, I woke up to the sound of something hitting the window. When I opened the curtains—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Trainer! Come down! It's a white Christmas!
Matikanetannhauser, holding a snowball in one hand, was waving.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whoa~! Everything's a silver world, up and down!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And on Christmas, too! How happy can you get!?
Matikanetannhauser is overjoyed like a puppy. But it's still cold. As I stomp my feet to warm up—
(Thud...)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hehe, you're open!
I got hit by a snowball.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, Trainer, you're all covered in snow!
I can't just take hits. I roll up some handy snow and throw it—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: —Whoa! Y-you got me~! Then I'll... Take this! And this! Ahahaha!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa... Hehehe, snowball fights are fun~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Actually, Trainer, you're surprisingly not very adult-like. Fufufu.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Haa~, what should we do next~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Oh, that's right! Come here for a sec, Trainer!
Where I was taken, a small snowman was standing.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I made this before calling you, Trainer Snowman!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I called you to show you this originally, but I totally forgot!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hey, doesn't this look a little similar?
Like the feel of these eyes~.
Now that you mention it, I can't say I don't feel like it captures some of the characteristics.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ehe!
It took quite a while, you know~.

It seems you worked pretty hard.
Since we have the chance, I'd like to give you something in return.
choice_data_list: Then, I'll make a snowman of you.
Then, I'll make a snowman of you.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh!?
Of me!?
A few hours later... After much trial and error, a snowman that somewhat resembles her was completed.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Wow! Thank you!
It's similar! I think so!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hey, since we're at it, let's line them up!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, so cute~!
...I don't want them to melt.
With Matikanetannhauser, I spent a day that would remain in my memories.
Where I was taken, a snow hut stood alone.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I made it before calling you, Trainer,
a little snow hut!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I originally called you to show you this,
but I completely forgot, ahaha.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
If you'd like, want to try going in?
It's surprisingly warm in there~.

Doing as told and going in...
It was pretty cramped, but there was a strange sense of comfort.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe.
I'd like to grill and eat mochi or something here, wouldn't you?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Still, they say snow absorbs sound,
but it's quiet inside the snow hut, huh.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Warm, quiet, beautiful,
...and with Trainer next to me...

Then, Matikanetannhauser leaned in,
resting her head on my shoulder.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Fufu, it's calming, isn't it...?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Can we stay like this just a little longer?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Yay.

After that, the snow began to fall softly...
For a while, the two of them enjoyed the snowy scenery together.
